title: Development Plan Delivery and Reform (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Public Expenditure, National
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) 
Order 2023. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 March 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited public expenditure national development plan delivery reform (delegation ministerial functions) order 2023 (2) order come operation 1 march 2023

title: Development Plan Delivery and Reform (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 2. The powers and duties of the Minister of Public Expenditure, National
text_raw:
2. The powers and duties of the Minister of Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform conferred on him by or under an Act 
specified in column (1) of the Schedule are delegated to Ossian Smyth, 
Minister of State at the Department of Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform, to the extent specified in column (2) 
of the Schedule opposite the mention of the Act so specified. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd March, 2023.
